newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 30.793 (30.793).
newsitem.headline: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 30.793 (30.793).

text.p: The National Bank of Slovakia (NBS) fixed the crown at 30.793 to the dollar and at 20.319 to the mark from 20.319, both unchanged from Friday's fixings.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (0940 GMT) and is within plus/minus 5.0 percent of a dollar/mark basket midpoint calculated at 11:30:00 CET.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of +0.26 percent, the same as on Friday.
